document_title: FortiOS supports weak ciphers suites when connecting to Fortiguard servers

note.text: When connecting to a FortiGuard server via TLS, FortiOS 5.2.3/5.0.11 and below is supporting multiple weak ciphers including anonymous, export and RC4. Although FortiGuard servers are actually offering back strong ciphers only, an attacker in a "Man in the Middle" position may leverage FortiOS' acceptance of weak ciphers to decipher and tamper with the TLS connection.
note.title: Description

note.text: MitM that could lead to traffic alteration or decryption
note.title: Impact

note.text: FortiOS (including with FIPS-CC licenses) must be upgraded to 5.0.12 or 5.2.4.
note.title: Solutions

acknowledgment.description: Thanks to the Citrix Security Team.

vulnerability.title: FortiOS supports weak ciphers suites when connecting to Fortiguard servers
